posts.name: roborb
posts.cooked: Hi all, we want to buy a few FRC Romi Red kits for the programming team. However, the school cannot place the order with pololu.com due to some PO issues.  Are there other vendors who offer the same kit, or at least all the parts that are included in the kit?

posts.name: Brian Wagg
posts.cooked:
It looks as though you may be able to order the separate components through digikey’s marketplace.

Romi Basic Kit Control Board Encoders Caster Kit

*Note this is a quick list I’ve pulled together while at work, please double check various part numbers and quantities needed yourself.

posts.name: roborb
posts.cooked: Thank you! That is great to know.  I will check the part numbers.

posts.name: roborb
posts.cooked: The list appears to be complete except the USB cable (which we don’t need).  I feel like I am missing something though, because the combined price of the parts on digikey.com ($103.46) is less than the price of the kit on pololu.com ($129.95).

posts.name: AllenGregoryIV
posts.cooked: The Romi Kits for FRC come partially assembled, the encoders are pre-soldered to the motors and the control board comes pre-mounted the base.

posts.name: roborb
posts.cooked: ok, that makes sense.  Thanks for the explanation.

posts.name: system
posts.cooked: This topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
